meanings.definition: The process of making something professional in character or status.
meanings.sent1: The professionalization of the company's image was evident in their new logo and branding.
meanings.sent2: She underwent professionalization when she started wearing business suits to work.
meanings.sent3: The professionalization of the clown's act involved trading in oversized shoes for polished oxfords.
meanings.sent4: The professionalization of the team transformed them from amateurs to seasoned experts.
meanings.sent5: The professionalization of the restaurant's service made dining there a truly upscale experience.

meanings.definition: The action or process of becoming professional in character or status.
meanings.sent1: The professionalization of the staff was evident in their improved customer service skills.
meanings.sent2: His professionalization as a chef began with enrolling in culinary school.
meanings.sent3: The professionalization of the dog groomer's services included offering spa treatments for pets.
meanings.sent4: The professionalization of the athlete's training regimen took him to the next level of competition.
meanings.sent5: The professionalization of the artist's portfolio attracted high-profile clients.
